minions.name: Doctor When
minions.description: You may return another of your minions in play to your hand. You may play it again as an extra minion

minions.name: Repeater Perfect
minions.description: Place an action from your discard pile on top of your deck

minions.name: Time Raider
minions.description: Talent: Place a card from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck

minions.name: Jumper
minions.description: Ongoing: When this minion goes to the discard pile (from play), you may place it back into your hand

actions.name: Do Over!
actions.description: Return your minion from a base to your hand. You may play it again as an extra minion.

actions.name: Into the Time Slip
actions.description: Return a card in play to its owner's hand

actions.name: 1.21 Gigawatts
actions.description: Shuffle all actions or all minions from your discard pile into your deck

actions.name: It's Astounding
actions.description: Play an action from your discard pile as an extra action

actions.name: Stasis Field
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: This base cannot score. Destroy this action at the start of your turn

actions.name: Time is Fleeting
actions.description: Play after a base scores if there is a base in the discard pile. Add a base of your choice from the discard pile instead of drawing a new base from the base deck

actions.name: Time Walk
actions.description: You may play an extra minion and an extra action this turn. Draw 2 cards. Place this card on the bottom of your deck instead of your discard pile

actions.name: Wormhole
actions.description: Special: Play after a base scores. Shuffle your minions there into your deck instead of placing them in the discard pile
